# Summary
- What does this change do and why?
- Any relevant context or follow-ups?

## Linked Issues
- Closes #<id>

## Type of Change
- [ ] feat: new feature
- [ ] fix: bug fix
- [ ] refactor: code change that does not add features or fix bugs
- [ ] docs: documentation only
- [ ] test: add or improve tests
- [ ] chore: tooling/ops/build
- [ ] perf: performance improvement
- [ ] style: formatting (no functional change)
- [ ] BREAKING CHANGE

## Screenshots / Demos (UI changes)
- Before/after images or short GIFs.

## Test Plan
- Local: `npm run dev` for manual testing, `npm run build` then `npm run preview` for production check.
- If tests exist: `npm test` (Vitest recommended).
- Steps to validate:
  1. ...
  2. ...

## Checklist
- [ ] Conventional Commit in PR title (e.g., `feat(ui): add shift filter`).
- [ ] Self-review completed and comments addressed.
- [ ] Updated docs or `AGENTS.md` if behavior/tooling changed.
- [ ] No secrets committed; use `.env.local` and `VITE_` prefixes.
- [ ] Screenshots/GIFs added for UI changes.
- [ ] Config updates (e.g., `vite.config.js`, `postcss.config.js`) documented.
- [ ] Tests added/updated or rationale provided if not applicable.

## Release Note
- One line describing the change for users/admins.
